resources.string: Codex of Rathe is a free and open-source card viewing application for the Flesh and Blood trading card game.
For more information about Flesh and Blood along with the latest rulings and tournament information, visit the Flesh and Blood website.

Codex of Rathe is in no way affiliated with Legend Story Studios. Legend Story Studios®, Flesh and Blood™, and set names are trademarks of Legend Story Studios. Flesh and Blood characters, cards, logos, and art are property of Legend Story Studios.
